m4us.core.messages¶

Provides commonly used messages to be passed between coroutines.

Inheritance Diagram¶

Members¶

class Message(**kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Base class for special messages passed between coroutines.

Implements :IMessage
Provides :IMessageFactory
class ProducerFinished(**kwargs)¶

Bases: m4us.core.messages.Message

Message that indicates that a producer has finished.

Implements :IProducerFinished
Provides :IMessageFactory
class Shutdown(**kwargs)¶

Bases: m4us.core.messages.Message

Message that indicates that a coroutine should shutdown.

Implements :IShutdown
Provides :IMessageFactory
